thread.title: Jordan Alexander Jewelry Chosen As A Finalist In The Diamond Empowerment Fund's Green Bracelet Initiative Design Contest
thread.title_full: Jordan Alexander Jewelry Chosen As A Finalist In The Diamond Empowerment Fund's Green Bracelet Initiative Design Contest - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Jordan Alexander Jewelry Chosen As A Finalist In The Diamond Empowerment Fund's Green Bracelet Initiative Design Contest
text:
Jordan Alexander Jewelry
BIRMINGHAM, Ala. , Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Jordan Alexander Jewelry was recently selected as one of four finalists in The Green Bracelet Initiative Design Contest. The contest was sponsored by The Diamond Empowerment Fund's ( D.E.F.) Diamond's Do Good Initiative.
The contest required participants to design a unique Green Charity Bracelet that signifies the global initiatives of D.E.F. The winner will be chosen by a combination of popular feedback from the The D.E.F Facebook Site (facebook.com/diamondempowermentfund) and input from a distinguished panel of judges. "We became involved in this contest through our participation with the Couture Jewelry Show in Las Vegas . It's an honor to be selected as a Finalist by an organization that's doing such wonderful things around the world," said Theresa Bruno , designer of Jordan Alexander Jewelry.
D.E.F was founded in 2007 by business entrepreneur Russell Simmons and leaders in the diamond and jewelry industries. D.E.F. is a global nonprofit organization whose mission is to support transformative initiatives in diamond communities throughout the world.
Using education, D.E.F seeks to empower individuals, communities and society toward future economic prosperity, stability and advancement. Since its inception, D.E.F. has directly contributed to the empowerment of over 2000 students through scholarships, by supporting four beneficiary organizations in Africa and India , including: African Leadership Academy in South Africa; Botswana Top Achievers Program in Botswana; CIDA City Campus in South Africa ; and Veerayatan's Colleges of Pharmacy, Business Administration, and Engineering in India . D.E.F. also supports diamond communities by hosting galas and events that raise awareness of D.E.F. initiatives, and by creating diamondsdogood.com, a website that tells the story of diamonds and the role they play in making the world a better place.
For more information about Jordan Alexander Jewelry visit jordanalexanderjewelry.com.
